## ParticleMaterial.rampMap property

Texture used as a color/alpha ramp (e.g., over particle lifetime). Sampled along U with `particleParams.w`<!-- -->. When set, enables the ramp map feature and marks uniforms dirty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get rampMap(): Texture2D;

set rampMap(tex: Texture2D);
```
